text: Mominon ko chahaiye kay eman walon ko chor ker kafiron ko apna dost na banayen aur jo aisa keray ga woh Allah Taalaa ki kissi himayat mein nahi magar yeh kay inn kay sharr say kissi tarah bachao maqsood ho aur Allah Taalaa khus tumhen apni zaat say dara raha hai aur Allah Taalaa hi ki taraf lot jana hai
